explanation: The formula for the resulting price used a wrong sign. If D[i] represents an additional discount, it should be subtracted from the price (in addition to the fixed discount Q). The buggy line added D[i] instead of subtracting it, so I changed the '+' to '-' in that line.
fixed_code:
N, P, Q = map(int, input().split())
D = list(map(int, input().split()))

ans = P
for i in range(N):
    ret = P - Q - D[i]
    ans = min(ans, ret)

print(ans)
